name: Playtonic/Grads in games jam - Yooka-Laylee inspired project
name_original: Playtonic/Grads in games jam - Yooka-Laylee inspired project
description:
Produced for a game jam, as a collaboration between Playtonic and grads in games. The idea of the jam was to create Yooka-Laylee inspired piece.

I was unable to spend any real time on the project due to other commitments, however I was happy to produce the following as a working prototype of a number of features.
